mapper.select: select * from t_user where 1=1 and id=#{id}
select * from t_user where 1=1 and phone=#{phoneNum} and status='1' and id!=#{id}

select u.id,u.user_name,u.phone,u.avatar,u.status,o.org_name as org_id from t_user u left join t_warehouse o on u.org_id=o.id where exists ( select user_id from t_user_role r where u.id=r.user_id and r.role_id='${roleId}') and user_name='${user.userName}' and phone='${user.phone}' and (u.org_id='${user.orgId}' or o.org_name='${user.orgId}') and u.status='${user.status}'

select u.id,u.user_name,u.phone,u.avatar,u.status,o.org_name as org_id from t_user u left join t_warehouse o on u.org_id=o.id where not exists ( select user_id from t_user_role r where u.id=r.user_id and r.role_id='${roleId}') and user_name='${user.userName}' and phone='${user.phone}' and (u.org_id='${user.orgId}' or o.org_name='${user.orgId}') and u.status='${user.status}'
select * from t_user where PHONE=#{phone} and USER_PASSWORD=#{oldPassWord}

select api_path as "apiPath" from T_RESOURCE_API_ADRESS raa where EXISTS ( select p.res_id from t_user u left join t_user_role ur on ur.user_id=u.id left join t_privilege p on p.ROLE_ID = ur.ROLE_ID where u.id = #{userId} and raa.RESOURCE_ID = p.res_id )

SELECT raa.api_path FROM t_user_role ur LEFT JOIN t_privilege p ON ur.role_id = p.role_id INNER JOIN t_resource_api_adress raa ON raa.resource_id = p.res_id WHERE ur.USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY raa.api_path

SELECT u.user_id AS "userId", u.user_name AS "userName" FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_user_organization uo ON u.ID = uo.USER_ID LEFT JOIN t_warehouse w ON uo.WAREHOUSE_CODE = w.ORG_CODE WHERE
w.ORG_CODE in
'${item}'
GROUP BY u.user_id
